replies.bodyText: This ignores the loop conditional: entry.getKey() <= ackLevel
replies.author: tkaitchuck

timeline.bodyText: This is not really thread safe. unmodifiableList returns a wrapper for readers, but readers can still be modified by this object, thus causing issues for anyone who might be iterating over it at the same time.
